details.purpose: Recording of clinical findings on physical examination of the mouth.
details.use: Use in conjunction with separate archetype/s for dental examinations when developed.

items.items: Findings about the angle of the mouth.
The uvuula is deviated to the right.
The uvula is deviated to the left.
The soft palate is flexible and mobile.
Relative size of tonsils in comparison to expected size.
The tonsils are reduced in size.
The tonsils are of expected size.
Detail about the angle of mouth.
Basic examination cluster for describing findings on physical examination when there is no named focus of examination.
Record of clinical findings on physical examination of mouth.
Textural description of the part examined.
A group of statements about the normality of the examination.
Drawing or image of the area examined.
